attributes.action: De-select all MP's calling for a second referendum.
attributes.background: I am sick and tired of MP after MP, the vast majority from leave constituencies standing up and calling for a second referendum. Most don't have the guts to say referendum so they hide under the new losers language of People's Vote. Let's remind these MP's that us thick 52% leave voters won in 2016.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this isn't something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. This would be the responsibility of the political parties.
